articles.author: Tyler Kepner
articles.title: Dick Allen's Hall of Fame Case Ran Out of Time - The New York Times
articles.description: The pandemic delayed a Golden Days committee vote that could have finally put Allen, who died on Monday, in Cooperstown.
articles.content: Allen had 351 homers and 1,848 hits. He never played in the World Series and was traded five times in a six-year stretch. He won Rookie of the Year and Most Valuable Player awards with a .292 career … [+1746 chars]
